title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, March 31, 2021
description: Today marks the 85th birthday of Marge Piercy. Author, feminist, and social activist, her latest work is one of poetry, “On the Way Out, Turn Off the Light.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today marks the 85th birthday of Marge Piercy. Author, feminist, and social activist, her latest work is one of poetry, “On the Way Out, Turn Off the Light.”
